articles.author: Emily Bary, , Bill Peters
articles.title: First Republic Bank's debt cut to junk by Moody's - MarketWatch
articles.description: First Republic faces ‘significant challenges,’ Moody’s says; First Republic stock ended more than 30% lower on Friday
articles.content: Moodys Investors Service downgraded its credit rating on First Republic Bank to junk late Friday, citing a deterioration in the banks financial profile.The downgrade reflects the deterioration in the… [+1833 chars]
